mapper.sql: ERND_IOE_CD, ERND_IOE_NM, ERND_UPR_IOE_CD, ERND_IOE_TP, CASE WHEN ERND_IOE_TP = 0 THEN '비목' WHEN ERND_IOE_TP = 1 THEN '현금' WHEN ERND_IOE_TP = 2 THEN '현물' WHEN ERND_IOE_TP = 3 THEN '미지급' END AS ERND_IOE_TP_NM, IRIS_ITEPD_GRP_CD, '['|| IRIS_ITEPD_GRP_CD || ']' || (SELECT ITEPD_GRP_CD_NM FROM IRIS_ITEPD_GRP_CD WHERE ITEPD_GRP_CD = IRIS_ITEPD_GRP_CD) AS IRIS_ITEPD_GRP_CD_NM, IRIS_ITEPD_CD, IRIS_ITEPD_CD_NM, IRIS_UPR_ITEPD_CD
mapper.select:
SELECT ROWNUM AS NO,
FROM IRIS_ITEPD_MAP WHERE 1=1
AND ERND_IOE_CD LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{erndIoeCd})||'%'
AND IRIS_ITEPD_CD LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{irisItepdCd})||'%'
AND ERND_IOE_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{erndIoeNm})||'%'
AND IRIS_ITEPD_CD_NM LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{irisItepdCdNm})||'%'
OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert:

)
